The property is in beautiful settings overlooking the sea. Whilst there is a private beach, it is not ideal for swimming. The facilities are relatively new so very comfortable but because it is spaced out most guest are transported by buggies, so sometimes inconvenient. The staff try very hard but some lack professionalism.

Hotel and location was priceless for sure. Cannot say the same about the service. For being rated one of the top 10 hotels to stay in Phuket, they could have selected their personnel better and put people there that can actually speak proper English. There were about 1,000 misunderstandings that we experienced being there for 3 days, because of language and cultural barriers. They really tried to go out of their way to help, but did not understand what we wanted to begin with. Thus, every service we requested was followed by prolonged delay. Worst impression of service was that housekeeping woke us up one early morning knowing that we are in the room and insisted on doing housekeeping while we were there even though we explained several times that we did not request or need housekeeping.
Fantastic ultra modern rooms with gorgeous views and ample space. Private pool was amazing. Service was exemplary. Restaurant was first class. Will definitely stay at the Naka again
Thank you all at Naka for the amazing stay! I will definitely be coming back again soon. I can't even describe how wonderful my stay was. Thank you again!

Great design, but not matched by build quality, which is a pity. The hotel is apparently working on the defects (we had a chance to speak with the 'project manger'), so I wish the hotel all the best to transform the Naka from a good into a truly great property. Staff quality is also uneven, with some with excellent language and service standards (who managed our request for room change very professionally and warmly) but there are others who could barely understand us and could do with a sunnier disposition.

it was great! the hotel was much more than I thought. the staff was amazingly polite. they catered to all our needs perfectly. Just need to offer new sandals everytime new customer comes in. that's all!
Very luxurious resort to stay in Thailand! Would certainly recommend to anyone!
good rest in the resort, private pool is not so private but, still very nice. if there is Chinese visitor nearby, a bit noisy..
Private beach and facilities short shuttle ride from Patong Beach Excellent

Excellent stay. Besides the fact that the location is a distance away from Patong, if you intend to stay in and enjoy the peace this place actually has everything you need. Perfect for couple looking to spend quality time together.

Just wanted to make our review short and simple. This is a beautiful place, top notch design, and a few good things to do there! The scenery was amazing! The service was awesome! The whole experience was fantastic. I would say that this place is more for couples for a romantic getaway. We stayed there for about three days and we still didn't get tired of it! Here's a list of our fav hilights! 1. Outdoor BathTub 2. Private Pool 3. Snorkling <- A MUST! You will be amazed... don't really need to go on a snorkling tour at all just do it at the hotel! 4. Buffet Breakfast amazing! 5. Dinner might be a bit pricy but was still awesome! 6. Evening sunset view!!! What more we can say... Awesome and amazing...!!! The only thing that I would mention is that some of wooding for room decoration might be a bit worn down due to the harsh sunlight... needs a bit maintenance. and one more thing.... this place is for people who are willing to chill and relax at the hotel. It's a bit secluded from downtown Phuket. Hope to come back soon again!
The place is amazing, excellent food, but the staff on the front desk and the room service are not very good.

Very trendy, relax and comfortable villa with a private pool and open bathtub, bed is soft and comfy with a remarkable sea view. Free drinks upon check in. Welcome fruit basket and complimentary minibar. Breakfast inclusive but it appears the only choice in the hotel. Very remote and no restaurant nearby however the food in the hotel is quite good.

The Naka is a secluded, quiet oasis amongst a very touristy part of Thailand. I stress the seclusion aspect because if you do want to get into the main town of Patong or to any place outside of your resort, you will need to take their 3x daily shuttle, or pay an exorbitant fee for a 'taxi' that is run by the hotel. However, if you are looking for peace and quiet, this is your place - its just gorgeous, private beach, pristine infinity pools, the works. Highly recommended.

One word can easily describe my stay: Impressive. The staff were fast to respond to my email when I request for an airport transfer 12 hrs prior to my arrival. Unfortunately, they could not get a driver to pick us up due to high bookings. First impression is always the most important. We were welcomed with a drink and a beautiful view of the sea. Front desk staff were all very helpful and courteous and check in is considered fast as well. The room has a beautiful view and all amenities are highlighted to us. Due to personal preference, I request for a change of room. I'm once again impressed when they called me and say they have a room for us if we do not mind changing room on the second day. I was impressed becuase I was very often rejected when i asked for a change of room and they will not bother to provide me an option to change my room during the next few days of my stay. This shows that The NAKA phuket has put their guest's stay experinece as priority and do not mind the hassle of tidying up two rooms or additional logistic. Well, basically during my 4D3N stay, it is totally awesome and I have zero negative feedback about them. Lastly, i wish to compliment Miss Titi for her great service.

Our stay at the Naka was nice, the staff were friendly, quite and secluded location with a private beach, close to several other beaches and if needed Patong area. With the establishment being so new I was disappointed in the buildings finishes. The Naka has a mix of new and tired looking facilities. The villas are not the most private to others I have stayed but are very spacious and the resort has a very unique design.

We love to stay here. Spending all time in the hotel. Staffs are friendly. Nice hotel for a couple and family. Although the beach front has many rocks but the good point is there are many fish and coral to discover.

Loved the location and design... Having a private pool was wonderful. Such a beautiful place. Was a bit concerned at the wear and tear of the resort..poor internal workmanship so evident in such a new place. For the price I expected a higher standard of finish. Lots of peeling exterior paint and interior plaster.

Good but not as good as expected. the morning breakfast is not good enough compare to other Phuket hotels. The condition of the villas are quite bad. there are lots of minor things makes it not perfect.

The hotel staff is quite friendly and helpful and the food choices and quality are excellent. Lunches and dinner were great. The hotel has some downsides though. Many of the rooms do not have complete privacy since the location is on a steep hillside. Because the stay was during a heavy rain and wind day, the hotel room, since it is cantilevered, actually shook and moved all night and the door made a horrible rattling. It was unnerving.
Relaxing, amazing, romantic, beutifull huge excusite room with a pool and huge black marble bath. 11 out of 10.
Superb view, excellent place to recharge, responsive staff
Amazing... simply amazing.. thank you the naka!!

Overall quality of the hotel is great.. Service, cleanliness, location, views, etc... Regd food, no great options in terms of food or restaurants(Cuisines). There is only one restaurant from breakfast to dinner and only one bar on the beach ( which closes at 6PM). SPA is under construction.

Very trendy, relax and comfortable designed villa with privacy. Good enough with a private swimming pool and open bathtub. They have prepared welcome fruit basket, tea bag and coffee, many bottles of mineral water, soft drinks, fruit juice and beer in the fridge with no charge. The room was great with a big balcony and ocean view. The sitting room was restful with smart TV and DVD player. The whole villa was pleasing but not enough lighting on the night, especially in the sitting room, toilet and shower room became very dangerous. The hotel staff and Tuk Tuk driver are very efficient with good manner. Breakfast are free and food are delicious but it appears that no choice with only one restaurant in the hotel. They provided 3 scheduled free Tuk Tuk between the hotel and Patong beach seems inadequate.
Very nice place for a getaway. Beach activities could have been better promoted.
This hotel has really nice view.Room is great although the landscape made our room doesn't feel private.We can see neighbor room easily.

Spent a weekend there. It fully rejuvenate me and my partner. The hotel feels like a home which have a 'million dollar worth' view. Turning in to bed with twinkles in the sky, waking up looking at the beautiful sea. Theres nothing more relaxing than this. The only disadvantages are it is not convenient to get to. U may nees to ask your driver to give them a call first. But likewise due to its location it is quiet and cozy. Will definitely return again.

Wonderful experience. Staff is very friendly and accomodating. Rooms are immaculate. Beds are softest and most comfortable that I have experienced going around the world. I ended up buying 2 pillows of the hotel. The only 2 things that bring the experience down but just by little is maybe because it is still under construction there are not so many people around but if yoy are looking for tranquillity this is it. Also pizzas seemed pre made / frozen which affects the flavour thought they have fully qualified staff and they will make any dish for you in request. But overall it was great.
Great service breakfast location awesome experience Went with young kids they took great care of us

The physical property is very nice, although the hotel seems to have been under construction for a very long time. The service is a bit lacking for what is supposed to be a 5 Star hotel. The fact that the rack rate is $1,000/night is a bit comical, and even at the Hotels.com rate, I think it is a bit overpriced. The physical property makes this a solid hotel, but it falls short of being a true 5 Star hotel.

Lovely staff, very helpful; pampered and received a great service Only one restaurant unfortunately and it's not the nicest one so taking the shuttle to go for dinner is worth it. You can tell it's not very easy to maintain the villas perfect conditions due to the humidity. Overall, great resort. We loved it.
enjoyable stay, with a nice pool and superb audiovisual system with lots of free dvd movies
great place fantastic staff and good view modern buildings i like it that is was a bit out of Patong

There was hardly any need to leave the hotel because everything you could possibly want or need for a relaxing holiday was inside the resort. The staff were amazing and always there to help with anything. Would highly recommend staying here if you don't want the hustle and bustle and tourists everywhere. Will be sure to return!
We had a incredible stay at this beautifully designed resort. Privacy was paramount and the staff were lovely and attentive.

My wife and I wanted to have a tropical private holiday and the Naka Phuket ticked all the boxes for a 5 star hotel. The buildings were very funky with huge modern rooms that were very comfortable. As each villa has it's own pool I was surprised how big these pools were and it was so relaxing looking out on the sea from the pool. If you stay here the barbecue on the beach at sunset is must. Staff and food were a high standard. This hotel is 20 min from Patoong so this was a good thing for us as we wanted total tranquillity but close enough to shopping or sights. The hotel is not quite complete so there is a small amount of building work in the distance but this did not disrupt our stay. I would book this hotel again...

Arriving at the Hotel you are taken away by the beauty of the hotel and its setting. One of the most beautiful resorts I've stayed at ever. Our private Villa & Pool were both perfect. The Staff was and service was 5 Star. The Breakfast was fantastic and the Food at the Hotel was delicious and the range was extensive. If I was to visit Phuket again, this is where I would stay and recommend it to my friends as well. Best, MH

My holiday was wonderful with The Naka Phuket. We stayed in the villa up above the hill to enjoy quite a lot of privacy and the beautiful ocean view. My room is S29/1. I like the layout of our room. You could enjoy an outdoor bath tub with total privacy. The swimming pool is large. Room was clean and the mini bar was free. You also could enjoy plenty of choices of food for breakfast. Overall, the food was good but some dishes (like the soup, hot dishes) was a bit too salty. It's about 25 minutes drive from hotel to Patong Beach. Would be nice if they can run the shuttle bus more frequently after full opening. I will definitely come back if they offer me the same room. I also received a very nice and touched surprise from the hotel - a birthday cake.

Our night time arrival at the Naka was greeted with the magnificent outdoor lobby; a huge dimly black marble reception desk with very welcoming reception staff providing refreshments. We were escorted to our room and shown the facilities. The apartments really are amazing and provide a luxurious home away from home with added benefits. The contemporary and modern interior was extremely comfortable, clean and private; which is necessary for the outdoor bathing area - oh and did I mention we had our very own infinity pool! The staff were extremely professional and friendly and happy to help with any request. Room service is available and the food is good. The undercover, outdoor breakfast hall also acts as one of the evening dining areas, the other area is set up on the beach providing freshly prepared grilled seafood - wonderful! The resort is only one year old and disappointingly the site is still under construction; which broke the tranquility a little during the day with construction noise, despite this - it really was not a big issue and the resort is very respectful to your privacy. The beach is amazing and large tress provide shelter from the hot sunshine. Willing staff who are happy to look after your refreshment needs and there is a bar-side eating area should you wish to shade from the sun. Watch the tides when going into the sea as a lot of sharp coral lies in wait. We found it best to swim off the floating pier, great snorkeling too!

Excellent villas with large private pools. Great location with a private beach. Out of the craziness and crowds of patong, but just a short drive if you want to check out that scene. Also close to some great restaurants go get off of the resort.

Enjoyed a two weeks stay. The location is great for a quiet getaway, nice private beach, great big pool. The restaurant is superb, western and Thai dishes by a Canadian chef. There are some obvious defects in construction, mainly woodwork and stone/tile work, which hopefully will be rectified by the time the resort fully opens. However, all above and great staff, and we left quite happy customers.

Outstanding quality of rooms and design. Excellent facilities and great private beach. Very quiet but only 15 mins to nightlife of Surin or Patong. Perfect to relax during the day away from the crowds and party in the evening. Only criticism is slight lack of "5 star" service from front desk eg unable to recommend restaurants, bars and often not proactive in service approach. However, overall a superb setting and 6 night stay over the crowded Christmas period.

The room we had was the best villa on the property. SE 1/5 The soft opening that they had in October was a bit to soft for us. The hotel pool area is still not finished 100% and there is still 50% of the rooms still under construction, so there is a bit of noise as you lay around the pool area. The staff are really lovely and helpful. When the resort is finished it will be a gorgeous place to stay to get away from it all. It is a bit out of the way so we rented a motor bike so we could get away at night and go to a beautiful beach where you could swim. I think it's over priced for the amount of construction that is still going on.
great

We went back and forth on whether or not to stay at the Naka which is 10 mins north of Patong or it's sister property La Flora which is right in the heart of Patong and on the beach, and we can safely say that without a doubt we made the right choice. We were blown away by the architectural wonder that is the Naka Phuket, from the stunning design of the open air reception area to the restaurant, to the pool...this place is truly a paradise and well worth the extra drive 10 mins in/out of town. When we arrived we were greeted with a selection of welcome beverages at sunset, our luggage loaded into a car and delivered to our villa. We were then transported to our villa and when we opened the door, nothing else could compare to the private sanctuary that awaits. If you're a details person and appreciate perfection as we do in our home, you will love this place. The staff was so eager to help, assist and please with all of our excursions, adventures and enjoyment of the property when we stayed in.

Fabulous place for a quiet getaway from the world with a great view of the sea and close to mother nature. Our room was as big as our residential area and came with complimentary mini bar beverages and fruits daily. The king-size bed was comfy with ample room for even 2 huge adults but the pillows were a tad too soft for my liking. Every morning we wake up to the sounds of crashing waves and a panoramic view of the sea- Amazing! It was like having a live picture in front of you every morning. To top this up, we have our very own exclusive beach, only visited by The Naka guests. We wish we owned a place like this. Hotel staff were friendly, very accommodating, diligent, polite and honest. A team of house keeping team came to clean our rooms upon our ad-hoc request and there were even engineers who arrived to clean our private pool (which we utilised everyday during our stay). I left my mobile phone in the room upon checkout and the hotel staff were honest to informed me and returned it to me promptly. I am very grateful. Despite the hotel in a soft launch stage, the basic amenities were there although we would prefer a wider choice of restaurants, game rooms and activities planned. I'm sure the end product of this luxurious hotel will be grand and magnificient when it's all done up. I would definitely return again to receive the same awesome and memorable experience. Thank you The Naka for the incredible experience. It was money well spent!

I've been Spoiled by The Naka phuket! All future trips that don't include staying here will be ruined. The Naka Phuket provided the best service, food and the view was amazing! The rooms are huge, clean and gorgeous! The private pool and the bedroom over looks the spetacular ocean view/ private beach. The hotel and Customer service was 6 star! Naka Phuket is giving 5 star hotels a huge challenge! We stayed 5 nights, we were greeted each time we returned from a night in town. Although, the hotel was a distance from town, hotel do provide free shuttle into town twice a day. We did not mind being away from town, it gave us a relaxing day and a quiet night to enjoy our vacation. This is by far the most gorgeous hotel I've stayed in. I highly recommend this hotel and I will definitely return. Not to mention, staff was extremely friendly, helpful and quick when I had request. Special thanks to the food staff and front desk Jack for making my stay even more memorable! Until next time :)

Being a yet from finish hotel - I'd say it has exceeded my expectation. The location was perfect, 40 minutes from airport and 20 minutes to Patong. The staff was very helpful and attentive, the restaurant in particular serves amazing food (better than the SILK Restaurant at the Andara Resort also at Kamala). Yet, a few things are still lacked from being a 100% resort - the spa was only temporary and there is no ipod docking/music system in our room. I am sure once the hotel reaches its completion it would be the best in the area.
This property is not completed but it certainly was perfect for us. Our room was amazing and the staff are excellent.

No privacy. Distance between each villa are too close. From my villa can see front desk reception and sea view has been blocked. Stayed for 5 days and changed to another villa on 3rd day but still don't think is worth for the price I've paid. Staff are friendly and service is good. Food is nice and private beach is excellent.
Privite pool with amazing view of the ocean and mountain.. Simply breathtaking... The room is very well designed in modern Style with an out door bathtub and balcony .... Must try hotel

I had to came to naka before the COVID-19 and that time the breakfast is good as this trip at that time will had the prams ham and blue cheese some different cheese not the slices cheese!I think it’s need to improve on the breakfast

Definitivamente el mejor hotel en Phuket. La comida deliciosa, las instalaciones muy lujosas y bonitas, el personal muy atento y excelente servicio. Recibimos un excelente trato por parte del personal, en especial Dee que estuvo pendiente de nosotros desde que llegamos hasta que nos fuimos. Muy recomendado!!
호텔 전용 비치가 특이하고 좋았다. 모레는 매우 입자가 부드럽고 고와서 편했다. 그러나 바다에 들어가니 돌이 너무 많아서 맨발로는 절대 못들어갈것 같았다. 호텔 메인 수영장이 너무 예쁘고 관리가 잘되어 있다. 전용풀은 날씨가 안좋아서인지 나뭇잎이나 기타 부유물이 많아서 이용하기가 어려웠다.
Amazing breakfast with amazing staffs. would love to stay there again.
excellent service good dining experience in villa the room is great, with good view

9名で5泊致しましたが、3棟でした。 1棟がとても遠く、そこには行かずじまいになりました。 配慮が無さすぎると思いました。 食事は、結構おいしくいただけます。 急坂と階段なので、自力で動けませんから、その都度車の迎えを頼むのが、 面倒でした。 設備のメンテが悪いと思います。 クーラーが一部屋つかないので、何回きても直らない。門の鍵がロックされない。 電球が切れているなど、いろいろありました。 日差しが強いので、黒のカーテンを部屋の場所によっては閉めています。 電気が暗すぎる等です。 お若いカップルが宿泊するのには良いかもしれませんが、年配者には不向きでした。
레스토랑 앞 바다 밑 잔디.그네가 이뻐서 사진 찍기 좋았다. 그러나 숙소에 녹이 쓴 부분이 있었고 숙소가 어두웠다.
施設、朝食も豊かで問題なし。 部屋の外にあるバスにお湯を貯めるのが時間がかかり少し大変。 ただ、当然といえば当然だが、日本語が全く通じなかった。（使えるスタッフもいない）
ロビーに着いた時から笑顔で対応してもらえました。下手な英語でも嫌な顔をせず対応してもらえました。プライベートプールがあり、お酒を飲みながら夕焼けを見ることもできます。朝食はビュッフェで種類が豊富でした。非日常の時間を過ごしたい人にはとてもおすすめのホテルです。今まで利用したホテルの中で一番といっても過言ではありません。

優點：一進房門就不想出門的酒店，看海的私人泳池很大很乾淨，景色超美一看出去就一大片海，可以躲左酒店一整天發呆放鬆沒有問題。Room service的餐飲跟餐廳的差不多，價錢都一樣不用特意下山 缺點：燈光略為不夠，最光都是不夠光，客廳晚上有點暗暗的。室外浴缸基本上是用不著，一直有落葉掉下來，感覺很髒。客廳的喇叭只可插andriod機，iPhone的朋友就不能用了。酒店建在山坡上，到酒店每個設施都要叫酒店篤篤，所以還是窩房間比較方便
設計好，住宿舒適，補給充足，餐飲不錯，員工服務 態度也好 房間及泳池仍有昆蟲，燈光太暗，應可調教 如房間能用反光玻璃，私隱度會更高 池景有大樹阻擋
Absolut det bästa hotellet vi bott på! :)

The view was simply unbeatable, the room was clean, but you can tell its getting old (ie: bulging floor board and doors). Staff was nice and helpful. The location however left something to be desired, while it is nicely hidden away from the rest of Phuket, giving you peace and quiet and privacy, it is however at least a good 20-30 mins to most tourist hot spots.(ie: took us one hour to get to the outlet). Shuttle bus to Patong beach was not frequent enough, with only 3 shuttles per day. Overall, we are happy with our stay, just wish it is a bit closer to everything else.
not deserved 5 stars
Good location Good service Good restaurant

후기와 호텔 소개 사진만큼 멋진 곳이었습니다. 일단 실물도 사진과 거의 비슷하나 아쉬운 점은 침실에 있는 3면 통창에 중앙부분에 불투명하게 가로로 선이 쭉 되어 있었습니다. 안전상의 이유로 해놓은 듯 했는데, 그게 뷰를 좀 가리고 통창의 매력을 반감시키는 것 같았습니다. 풀빌라 풀은 높이 및 넓이가 둘이 놀기에 적당 했으며, 튜브를 타고 놀기엔 조식당 옆에 위치한 비치가든 룸이 더 좋아보였습니다. 아이가 있거나 가족들이 놀기에도 아무래도 땅 옆에 붙은 수영장이 더 안전해 보입니다. 뷰를 위해 비치가든 룸을 안했는데, 바로 앞에 가리는 것 없이 비치고 앞에 정원에 사람이 그렇게 많이 지나다니지 않아서 다음번엔 그 룸에 머물러 보고 싶습니다. 식당과 수영장과 비치 접근성이 더 좋아 이용하기 편할 듯 합니다. 저희 룸은 버기카가 지나다니는 길 바로 옆에 위치했었어서 개인 프라이버시 보장은 조금 떨어지는 느낌이었습니다만 조식당까지 걸어갈 수 있는 가까운 거리여서 매번 버기를 안불러도 되는 장점이 있었습니다. 조식당 메뉴는 여느 리조트와 비슷했고 쌀국수는 맛있었습니다. 특별히 막 먹을 게 많이 있다고는 생각 안되며 조식당 자체 분위기도 너무 멋있고 바로 앞에 인피니트 풀과 연결되고 비치와도 연결되서 저녁식사를 하기에도 너무 분위기 좋았습니다. 수영장은 밤에 훨씬 이쁜데 오후 7시까지만 이용제한이 되는게 아쉬웠으며, 정수되는 샤워기를 가져갔는데 빠통비치에 있는 다른 리조트는 괜찮았는데 더 나카에서 하룻밤 만에 완전 새까매지는 경험을 했습니다. 자쿠지에 물을 받았었는데 수도꼭지에서 시커먼 물이 나와서 깜짝 놀랐으며, 물 상태가 안좋은걸 리조트에서도 이미 알고 있는지 양치 컵 옆에 생수 2병을 배치해 놓았더군요. 필터 사진을 같이 첨부하여, 이 곳을 가려면 정수샤워기는 필참 하시는 게 좋겠습니다. 밤보다 아침에 더 물상태는 안좋았습니다. 그래도 전반적으로 너무 고급지고 멋진 곳이라 기회가 되면 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.

الباب الخارجي مكسور وحاولوا تصليحه اثناء اقامتي اكثر من مره وطلبت فيلا فوق وعطوني تحت اخر شي ولا يوجد فعاليات داخل المنتجع ابدا وتقريبا شبه فاضي وهدوء الى ابعد درجه الصراحه كثير المبلغ الي دفعته فيه المفروض يقدمون لي تعويض على الباب الي مكسور طوال فتره الاقامه
일단 도착해서 로비에서 부터 너무 기분이 좋았습니다. 그리고 직원이 친절 하게 방 설명도 해주고 룸 컨디션이 너무 좋았습니다. 하우스키핑 서비스도 너무 좋았습니다.

- I was planning a birthday surprise for my friend, and The Naka Phuket executed the plan very well. The way I wanted the balloon decoration was easily conveyed through email over pictures. The staff were really good at giving ”the eye” indicating which room the balloons were in. Beautiful and fun memories! - We got early check-in once the balloon setup was ready. And a late checkout by two hours. - A complimentary birthday cake was supposed to be delivered at 7.30am the second morning, but it didn’t arrive. Called after breakfast to ask about it and it came promptly. - The concrete wall is absolutely perfect for Instagram lovers! - If there is something I must nitpick on it will be the location of the electric outlets. I didn’t find any close to a mirror so I can blow dry my hair. - Staff were knowledgeable about restaurants in the vicinity. There is one up the hill which has fantastic view and delicious food! Pocket friendly too! - Buggy drivers very friendly. A few remember our villa number! Thank you The Naka Phuket!
かなり綺麗でオススメ！！

신혼여행으로 다녀 왔습니다. 일단 로비에 도착하면 산과 바다가 보이는 말도 안되는 멋진 경치를 볼 수 있어 기분이 좋습니다. 객실이 너무 깨끗하고 동선이 좋아 조식을 먹으러 가는 시간도 아까웠습니다. 여행중에 지갑을 잃어버렸는데 어디서 잃어버린지도 모르는 지갑을 찾아 준다고 택시회사 공항에 전화를 거는 모습을 보고 감동을 받았습니다. 빠통과 가까워 왔다갔다 하기도 좋지만 풀빌라에서 최대한 혜택을 누리고 싶어 계속 방에만 있었습니다. 너무 유명해지는걸 원하지 않습니다.

The view is stunning, service is excellent, food is delicious every things is perfect ,must try their massage it is great , but i suggest they could have more selection for the room service menu as I don’t like go out and just want to spend my time in the hotel : )

We expect the room type we booked would be the same as the picture shown in Expedia but unfortunately it was not the case when we arrived to the room. The swimming pool view originally with the beach scenery is all blocked with the plants (no views at all) and the bedroom view is also not according to the picture shown with 270-degree view of the sea (only front view with sea). The most disappointing experience was the front desk staff attitude. They claimed the villas are at different sea level so the views may vary. We do not expect the view are so different from the pictures and far from our expectation. At first they told us the room was the only room left with the room type we have booked but after we insisted, they provided us a few more rooms to pick. We got a room which is similar to the room type we saw in Expedia but it was not exactly the same. It was a matter of integrity and sincerity to customers. The negotiation lasted for an hour and the experience ruined our long-awaited stay here. Even the view is nice but I do not recommend others to stay at this hotel with poor customer service.

Das Hotel besteht aus vielen einzelnen Bungalows, welche an einem Hügel gelegen, sehr gut in die Natur integriert sind. Das ganze ist extrem auf Design ausgelegt. Teilweise etwas zu viel. So hat es beispielsweise nur Glasflächen im Bungalow, am Tag muss der Vorhang gezogen werden, sonst wird es zu heiss im Raum und die Klimaanlage funktioniert auf Hochtouren. Frühstücksbuffet ist sehr und der Service ist ausgezeichnet. Die Anlage ist weitläufig. Wer will kann sich jeweils mit einem Buggy abholen oder bringen lassen, das funktioniert problemlos. Der Sandstrand ist schön und sehr sauber. Wer Ruhe sucht, der ist hier richtig.
住宿極大極好，但私人泳池旁的 canopy 竟然漏水，下雨時 canopy 亦如瀑布; 私人沙灘不宜游泳，太多石頭，只可浮潛，穿蛙鞋可保護脚底！

The bedroom overall is spacious with pool, but the pool isn't big enough for swimming. The living area is a bit dark at night time while both washroom & bathroom are too dark, feel not comfortable. I saw gecko (nearly dead) at the pool side of my villa. The room cleaning service was held at late afternoon till 7pm. I am surprised that someone get into my villa one time (as I didn't put "Don't disturb" signal outside the door). After checking the reception, noticed that it's room cleaning service. The "Bento Box" (room service) is great and yummy. I will definitely order "Bentox Box" next time again. The breakfast buffet is nice too. The staff is really friendly & nice. But I had called "Tuk Tuk" twice, the waiting time is over 15mins.

訂房寫明是Vila pool , 去到求奇比間Spy 房，共用泳池，泳池底紙皮石剥落，整傷我腳底，要回國求醫，經理態度惡劣。聲稱超賣房間不能提供原有房間，拒絕道歉，最后離開時通路水浸，差點趕不及班機，大堂停電，要摸黑進入check out. 充份理解金玉其外，敗絮其中。 Hotel manager have bad temper. I booked the formal room through hotel.com, But hotel only give me a spy room for us. Share Swimming pool was broken. my leg being hurt during swimming. Hotel lobby no electric supply when I check out . The road to airport and Patong was flood and blocked when I left. 5 stars hotel but hostel service provided. Strongly not recommend

The outlook of the individual rooms are special and great for photo taking. The bedroom is very spacious but the pool is a little too small to swim. The public pool is however large and overlooking the beach. I find the bedroom too dark at night and the layout of the shower room and toilet a bit weird. We had three people living in the room, but there was no additional bed. Instead, one person had to sleep in a couch, which was not very comfy. It is not easy to get around the hotel as everything is a bit away, so had to ask for the buggy service all the time.

一泊だけの利用でしたがとても満足しました。 ロビースタッフも丁寧な対応してくださって、到着が早めでしたが部屋の用意ができるまでロビーの下にあるエアコンが効いた部屋で待つことにしました。軽食や飲み物が用意されてありました。 ヴィラもとても綺麗でした。海は木の枝で少ししか見られなき場所でしたが少し歩けば海につくので全然問題なかったです。私達のヴィラは海に近く朝食のレストランからも近かったので平気でしたが奥のヴィラに泊まる人はビークルを呼ばないと移動が大変そうだなと思いました。ヴィラは何処も坂道なので。 食事も美味しかったです。 周りに何もなくてゆっくりヴィラで過ごしたい人はいいと思います。街へのバスも定期的に出てます。 本当にまたゆっくりしたいときに再訪したいなと思いました。
뷰랑 서비스는 정말 좋앗으나 전반적으로 깨끗하지 않앗고 너무 어두웟습니다. 비가오고 나서인지 침대랑 이불이 눅눅햇어요. 같은가격이면 훨씬 좋은 풀빌라를 갈거같네요.
とにかく、リゾートタイプの最高のホテルです。ファミリービラのタイプで宿泊しました。広すぎて家族４人で、つかいきりません。よい思い出になりましたので、環境は、自然がいっぱいでした。昼も夜も静かです。 レストランに行くにも、くるまで送り迎えしてもらい、楽をしました。リラックスするには、最高です。

1ベッドプールヴィラに友人と3人で利用 3人でもゆとりのある部屋で問題はありませんでした。使い勝手も良かったです。 デッキチェアも1台増やして置いても、広々としたプールサイドで寛げました。 部屋のミニバーはアルコールも含め全部フリーでした。 朝食も種類、味と満足の内容でした。 ビーチは岩が多い為、泳ぐなら午前中が良いですが、足元要注意です。 ビーチサイド、プールサイド共に居心地が良く寛げます。 パトンまでのシャトルバスがあるので、夕方から買い物や夕食に2回利用しました。帰りはトゥクトゥクとタクシー、どちらも交渉で450バーツです。交渉なのでそれより安くなるかもですね。 最終日にルーフトップバーのTHE MEKAに行きました。サンセットに合わせて予約をオススメします。料理も美味しく眺めも最高でした。 spaも利用しましたが、スクラブの種類も豊富で良かったです。 リゾート3人旅は初めてでしたが、3人でも問題無く居心地良いホテルでした。 NAKAを思う存分堪能して来ました！
Loistavaa arkkitehtuuria. Valitettavasti rakennusten ylläpitäminen on huonolla jamalla.

空港からは遠く、便利ではありません。周りには買い物をするところもありません。だから、のんびり過ごせます。観光や買い物好きには、向いていないと思います。レンタカーで移動する人には良いかもしれません。 朝食は種類豊富でまずまずです。ルームサービスのメニューが長期滞在だと飽きるかも。 冷蔵庫のビール、ジュースは毎日補充があります。トイレは日本式のウォシュレットではありません、シャワータイプの水しか出ません。浴衣式の寝巻き？はあります。プラーベートプール用と、シャワー・お風呂用のタオルが別々であります。浴槽は部屋の外で石造り。シャワージェル・シャンプー・コンディショナーはモルトンブラウンで、毎日補充があります。
